description.english: Begin Chapter One.
description.german: Starte Kapitel Eins.
description.french: Commence le chapitre un.
description.spanish: Empieza el capítulo uno.
description.brazilian: Começa o capítulo um.

description.english: Recover Linda's toolbox.
description.german: Hol dir Lindas Werkzeugkasten zurück.
description.french: Récupère la boîte à outils de Linda.
description.spanish: Recupera la caja de herramientas de Linda.
description.brazilian: Recupera a caixa de ferramentas da Linda.

description.english: Give the school hamster a Twonkie.
description.german: Gib dem Schulhamster einen Twonkie.
description.french: Donne un Twonkie au hamster de l'école.
description.spanish: Dale al hámster del instituto un Twonkie.
description.schinese: 给学校仓鼠吃特旺基糕。
description.brazilian: Dê ao hamster do colégio um Twonkie.

description.english: Begin Chapter Two.
description.german: Starte Kapitel Zwei.
description.french: Commence le chapitre deux.
description.spanish: Empieza el capítulo dos.
description.brazilian: Começa o capítulo dois.

description.english: Restore the electricity at the dam.
description.german: Stelle die Elektrizität am Staudamm wieder her.
description.french: Rétablis l'électricité au barrage.
description.spanish: Restaura la electricidad en la presa.
description.brazilian: Restaura a eletricidade da represa.

description.english: Take a ride on the mine cart.
description.german: Fahre mit dem Minenwagen.
description.french: Monte dans le chariot de la mine.
description.spanish: Monta en la vagoneta de la mina.
description.brazilian: Entra na vagonete da mina.

description.english: Witness Betty's meltdown.
description.german: Werde Zeuge von Bettys Wutanfall.
description.french: Ne rate pas la crise de colère de Betty.
description.spanish: No te pierdas el berrinche de Betty.
description.brazilian: Não perca a birra da Betty.

description.english: Meet the dinosaur in the depths.
description.german: Triff den Dinosaurier in den Tiefen.
description.french: Rencontre le dinosaure dans les profondeurs.
description.spanish: Conoce al dinosaurio en las profundidades.
description.brazilian: Conheça o dinossauro das profundezas.

description.english: Begin Chapter Three.
description.german: Starte Kapitel Drei.
description.french: Commence le chapitre trois.
description.spanish: Empieza el capítulo tres.
description.brazilian: Começa ocapítulo três.

description.english: Blow up Pat Garrett's statue.
description.german: Spreng die Statue von Pat Garrett in die Luft.
description.french: Fais exploser la statue de Pat Garrett.
description.spanish: Vuela por los aires la estatua de Pat Garrett.
description.schinese: 炸毁帕特·加勒特的雕像。
description.brazilian: Explode pelos ares a estátua de Pat Garrett.

description.english: Execute the bank heist.
description.german: Raube die Bank aus.
description.french: Mène à bien le braquage de la banque.
description.spanish: Lleva a cabo el atraco al banco.
description.brazilian: Leva a cabo o assalto ao banco.

description.english: Successfully incriminate Lazlo Hardy.
description.german: Zwinge Lazlo Hardy zu einem Geständnis.
description.french: Force Lazlo Hardy à avouer.
description.spanish: Fuerza a Lazlo Hardy a confesar.
description.brazilian: Force o Lazlo Hardy a confessar.

displayName.spanish: Sueños que se esfuman entre las llamas
displayName.brazilian: Sonhos que se transformam em chamas

description.english: Burn down the tiki bar.
description.german: Brenne die Tiki-Bar nieder.
description.french: Brûle le bar hawaïen.
description.spanish: Quema el bar hawaiano.
description.brazilian: Queime o bar havaiano.

description.english: Begin Chapter Four.
description.german: Starte Kapitel Vier.
description.french: Commence le chapitre quatre.
description.spanish: Empieza el capítulo cuatro.
description.brazilian: Começa o capítulo quatro.

description.english: Finish the "one-pig sneaking mission."
description.german: Beende die Mission "Infiltriertes Schwein".
description.french: Termine la mission du "cochon infiltré".
description.spanish: Termina la misión «un cerdo infiltrado».
description.schinese: 完成“一只猪的潜行任务”。
description.brazilian: Termina a missão "Um porco disfarçado"

description.english: Complete your journey of self-discovery.
description.german: Finde dich selbst auf deiner Reise der Selbstentdeckung.
description.french: Termine ton voyage de découverte de soi.
description.spanish: Completa tu viaje de autodescubrimiento.
description.brazilian: Complete sua jornada de autodescoberta.

description.english: Begin Chapter Five.
description.german: Starte Kapitel Fünf.
description.french: Commence le chapitre cinq.
description.spanish: Empieza el capítulo cinco.
description.brazilian: Começa o capítulo cinco.

displayName.brazilian: Não, eu sou o seu pai

description.english: Have one final conversation with Gen. Hartman.
description.german: Rede ein letztes Mal mit General Hartman.
description.french: Aie une dernière conversation avec le Général Hartman.
description.spanish: Ten una última conversación con el General Hartman.
description.schinese: 与哈特曼将军进行最后一次对话。
description.russian: Поговори в последний раз с генералом Хартманом.
description.brazilian: Tenha uma última conversa com o General Hartman.

description.english: Watch the entire credits sequence.
description.german: Sieh dir die gesamte Abspannsequenz an.
description.french: Regarde tout le générique de fin.
description.spanish: Mira la secuencia de créditos entera.
description.brazilian: Veja a sequência de créditos inteira.

description.english: Finish the game.
description.german: Spiele das Spiel durch.
description.french: Termine le jeu.
description.spanish: Termina el juego.
description.brazilian: Termina o jogo.

description.english: Force-feed Betty her least favorite food.
description.german: Zwing Betty, ihr Hassgericht zu essen.
description.french: Oblige Betty à manger son plat le moins préféré.
description.spanish: Obliga a Betty a comer su comida menos favorita.
description.schinese: 强迫贝蒂吃她最不喜欢的食物。
description.russian: Насильно накорми Бетти ее наименее любимой едой.
description.brazilian: Obrigue a Betty a comer sua comida menos favorita.

displayName.english: When You Stare Into the Abyss...
displayName.german: Wenn du in den Abgrund starrst...
displayName.brazilian: Quando você olhar fixamente para o abismo...

description.english: Examine the filthy cell one too many times.
description.german: Untersuche die schmutzige Zelle öfter, als dir lieb ist.
description.french: Examine la cellule sale trop de fois.
description.spanish: Examina la celda mugrienta demasiadas veces.
description.schinese: 检查肮脏的牢房,次数太多了。
description.russian: Осмотри грязную камеру слишком много раз.
description.brazilian: Examine a cela imunda muitas vezes.

description.english: Get the director to fire Wilburforce.
description.german: Bring den Direktor dazu, Wilburforce zu feuern.
description.french: Fais en sorte que le directeur renvoie Wilburforce.
description.spanish: Haz que el director despida a Wilburforce.
description.schinese: 让导演解雇威尔伯福斯。
description.brazilian: Faça com que o diretor demita Wilburforce.

displayName.english: Please Be a Secret Door... Yay!
displayName.french: S'il te plaît, que ce soit une porte secrète... Youpi !
displayName.spanish: Por favor, que sea una puerta secreta... ¡Yuju!
displayName.russian: Пусть это будет потайной дверью... Ура!
displayName.brazilian: Por favor, que seja uma porta secreta... uhu!

description.english: Find the manor's hidden entrance.
description.german: Finde den versteckten Eingang der Villa.
description.french: Trouve l'entrée secrète du manoir.
description.spanish: Encuentra la entrada secreta de la mansión.
description.brazilian: Encontre a entrada secreta da mansão.

description.english: Only take back what is yours.
description.german: Hol dir nur zurück, was dir gehört.
description.french: Récupère seulement ce qui est à toi.
description.spanish: Recupera solo lo que es tuyo.
description.russian: Забери только то, что принадлежит тебе.
description.brazilian: Ecupere de volta somente o que é seu.

displayName.german: Jeder Tag ist ein guter Tag für Tacos!
displayName.french: Des tacos le mardi ? Non, des tacos tous les jours !
displayName.schinese: 塔可星期二?塔可天天有!
displayName.brazilian: Tacos terças-feiras? Tacos todos os dias!

description.english: Listen to all of the Taco Pendejo advertisements.
description.german: Höre dir alle Taco-Pendejo-Werbungen an.
description.french: Écoute toutes les publicités de Taco Pendejo.
description.spanish: Escucha todos los anuncios del Taco Pendejo.
description.schinese: 听完所有塔可·彭德霍的广告。
description.brazilian: Escute todos os anúncios do Taco Pendejo.

displayName.english: The End of the Longest Nap
displayName.french: La fin de la sieste la plus longue
displayName.spanish: El fin de la siesta más larga
displayName.brazilian: O fim da soneca mais longa

description.english: Save Taquito from his dreadful fate.
description.german: Rette Taquito vor seinem furchtbaren Schicksal.
description.french: Sauve Taquito de son terrible destin.
description.spanish: Salva a Taquito de su terrible destino.
description.schinese: 拯救塔可图免于可怕的命运。
description.brazilian: Salve o Taquito de seu terrível destino.

description.english: Experience the afterlife.
description.german: Erlebe das Leben nach dem Tod.
description.french: Expérimente l'au-delà.
description.spanish: Experimenta la vida después de la muerte.
description.brazilian: Experimente a vida após a morte.

displayName.german: Na, das ist doch mal eine Gabel
displayName.spanish: Esto sí que es un tenedor
displayName.brazilian: Isso é que é um garfo

description.english: Obtain Poseidon's trident.
description.german: Besorge dir Poseidons Dreizack.
description.french: Obtient le trident de Poséidon.
description.spanish: Consigue el tridente de Poseidón.
description.brazilian: Pegue o tridente de Poseidon.

description.english: Guess all the answers to Sherman's riddles correctly.
description.german: Errate alle von Shermans Rätseln.
description.french: Réponds correctement à toutes les énigmes de Sherman.
description.spanish: Adivina correctamente todos los acertijos de Sherman.
description.schinese: 正确猜出谢尔曼谜语的所有答案。
description.brazilian: Adivinhe corretamente todos os enigmas de Sherman.

description.english: Visit Pam's basement.
description.german: Gehe in Pams Keller.
description.french: Visite le sous-sol de Pam.
description.spanish: Visita el sótano de Pam.
description.brazilian: Visite o porão de Pam.

description.english: Make the dam's control center systems fail.
description.german: Bringe die Systeme im Kontrollzentrum des Staudamms zum Versagen.
description.french: Fais échouer les systèmes du centre de contrôle du barrage.
description.spanish: Haz que fallen los sistemas del centro de control de la presa.
description.schinese: 让大坝的控制中心系统失灵。
description.russian: Выведи из строя системы центра управления плотины.
description.brazilian: Faça com que os sistemas do centro de controle da represa falhem.

description.english: Have Betty spend too much time underwater.
description.german: Lass Betty zu viel Zeit unter Wasser verbringen.
description.french: Fais passer Betty trop de temps sous l'eau.
description.spanish: Haz que Betty pase demasiado tiempo bajo el agua.
description.russian: Заставь Бетти провести слишком много времени под водой.
description.brazilian: Faça com que Betty passe muito tempo embaixo d'água.

description.english: Confess all of Betty's sins.
description.german: Bekenne alle Sünden von Betty.
description.french: Confesse tous les péchés de Betty.
description.spanish: Confiesa todos los pecados de Betty.
description.brazilian: Confesse todos os pecados de Betty.

description.english: Find the secrets of the Necronomicon.
description.german: Finde die Geheimnisse des Necronomicon.
description.french: Découvre les secrets du Nécronomicon.
description.spanish: Encuentra los secretos del Necronomicón.
description.brazilian: Encontre os segredos do Necronomicon.

description.english: Discover the echo's true identity.
description.german: Finde heraus, wer hinter dem Echo steckt.
description.french: Découvre la véritable identité de l'écho.
description.spanish: Descubre la verdadera identidad del eco.
description.brazilian: Descubra a verdadeira identidade do eco.

description.english: Be worthy of pulling the Farmer's Bident from the stone.
description.german: Erweise dich als würdig und Ziehe den Bauern-Dreizack aus dem Stein.
description.french: Sois digne de retirer la fourche de fermier de la pierre.
description.spanish: Sé digno de sacar la horca de granjero de la piedra.
description.schinese: 值得从石头上拔出农夫的双刃剑。
description.russian: Окажись достойным того, чтобы вытащить из камня фермерские вилы.
description.brazilian: Seja digno de tirar a forquilha do fazendeiro da pedra.

description.english: Get kicked off the tower by the cow too many times.
description.german: Lass dich zu oft von der Kuh vom Turm werfen.
description.french: Fais-toi éjecter de la tour par la vache trop de fois.
description.spanish: Consigue que la vaca te eche de la torre demasiadas veces.
description.schinese: 被奶牛踢下塔顶的次数太多。
description.russian: Заставь корову сбросить тебя с башни слишком много раз.
description.brazilian: Faça com que a vaca te jogue da torre muitas vezes.

description.english: Wait for the plane's engines to stop.
description.german: Warte, bis die Triebwerke des Flugzeugs stoppen.
description.french: Attends que les moteurs de l'avion s'arrêtent.
description.spanish: Espera a que se detengan los motores del avión.
description.brazilian: Espere que os motores do avião parem.

description.english: Protect national secrets from the Soviets.
description.german: Schütze die nationalen Geheimnisse vor den Sowjets.
description.french: Protège les secrets nationaux des Soviétiques.
description.spanish: Protege los secretos nacionales de los soviéticos.
description.schinese: 保护国家机密免遭苏联人窃取。
description.brazilian: Proteja os segredos nacionais dos soviéticos.

description.english: Make Betty take a leap of faith.
description.german: Bring Betty dazu, einen Sprung ins Unbekannte zu machen
description.french: Fais faire un saut de la foi à Betty.
description.spanish: Haz que Betty dé un salto de fe.
description.schinese: 让贝蒂做出勇敢的尝试。
description.russian: Заставь Бетти совершить прыжок в неизвестность.
description.brazilian: Faça a Betty dar um salto de fé.

displayName.french: Brevet en cours. Ne me le vole pas !

description.english: Build all three of Betty's great inventions.
description.german: Baue alle drei von Bettys großartigen Erfindungen.
description.french: Construis les trois grandes inventions de Betty.
description.spanish: Construye los tres grandes inventos de Betty.
description.schinese: 建造贝蒂的三项伟大发明。
description.russian: Создай все три великих изобретения Бетти.
description.brazilian: Construa as três grandes invenções da Betty.

description.english: Examine Betty's diamond one too many times.
description.german: Untersuche Bettys Diamanten öfter, als ihr lieb ist.
description.french: Examine le diamant de Betty trop de fois.
description.spanish: Examina el diamante de Betty demasiadas veces.
description.russian: Осмотри алмаз Бетти слишком много раз.
description.brazilian: Examine o diamante da Betty muitas vezes.

description.english: Interact with every animal in the game.
description.german: Interagiere mit allen Tieren im Spiel.
description.french: Interagis avec tous les animaux du jeu.
description.spanish: Interactúa con todos los animales del juego.
description.schinese: 与游戏中的每只动物互动。
description.russian: Пообщайся с каждым животным в игре.
description.brazilian: Interaja com todos os animais do jogo.

description.english: Witness the fall of autumn's last leaf.
description.german: Erlebe den Fall des letzten Herbstblattes.
description.french: Assiste à la chute de la dernière feuille d'automne.
description.spanish: Presencia la caída de la última hoja del otoño.
description.schinese: 见证秋叶飘落的最后一刻。
description.russian: Стань свидетелем падения последнего осеннего листа.
description.brazilian: Testemunhe a queda da última folha de outono.

displayName.english: The Legend of the Great Sherman

description.english: Hear the tale of the Great Sherman.
description.german: Höre dir die Geschichte des Großen Sherman an.
description.french: Écoute l'histoire du Grand Sherman.
description.spanish: Escucha el cuento del Gran Sherman.
description.brazilian: Escute a história do Grande Sherman.

displayName.french: On dirait que ça marche pas

description.english: Interact with the Kamehameha sign one too many times.
description.german: Interagiere mehrfach mit dem Kamehameha-Zeichen.
description.french: Interagis avec l'enseigne du Kamehameha trop de fois.
description.spanish: Interactúa con el cartel del Kamehameha demasiadas veces.
description.russian: Взаимодействуй с вывеской «Камехамеха» слишком много раз.
description.brazilian: Interaja com o cartaz do Kamehameha muitas vezes.

description.english: Behold the splendor that is Rocco the Roach.
description.german: Sieh dir Rocco die Kakerlake in seiner ganzen Pracht an.
description.french: Contemple la splendeur de Rocco le Cafard.
description.spanish: Contempla a Rocco la cucaracha en todo su esplendor.
description.brazilian: Contemple ao Rocco, a barata, em todo o seu esplendor.

description.english: Meet Sir Rockington, Ben's pet rock.
description.german: Triff Sir Rockington, Bens Haustier-Stein.
description.french: Rencontre Sir Rockington, le caillou de compagnie de Ben.
description.spanish: Conoce a Sir Rockington, la piedra mascota de Ben.
description.schinese: 认识本的宠物石头洛克顿爵士。
description.russian: Познакомься с сэром Рокингтоном, камнем-питомцем Бена.
description.brazilian: Conheça Sir Rockington, a pedra de estimação de Ben.

displayName.english: Who in the World is Ms. Hart?
displayName.german: Wer um alles in der Welt ist Ms. Hart?
displayName.brazilian: Quem diabos é a Srta. Hart?

description.english: Discover Ms. Hart's true identity.
description.german: Decke Ms. Harts wahre Identität auf.
description.french: Découvre la véritable identité de Mme Hart.
description.spanish: Descubre la verdadera identidad de la Srta. Hart.
description.schinese: 发现哈特女士的真实身份。
description.brazilian: Descubra a verdadeira identidade da Srta. Hart.

description.english: Bring Betty back from the dead.
description.german: Lass Betty von den Toten auferstehen.
description.french: Ramène Betty d'entre les morts.
description.spanish: Trae a Betty de vuelta de la muerte.
description.brazilian: Traga Betty de volta dos mortos.

description.english: Get no help from Wilburforce.
description.german: Erhalte keine Hilfe von Wilburforce.
description.french: Ne reçois pas d'aide de Wilburforce.
description.spanish: No dejes que Wilburforce te ayude.
description.russian: Не получи ни капли помощи от Уилбурфорса.
description.brazilian: Não deixe que Wilburforce te ajude.

description.english: Snoop on Benjamin's property one time too many.
description.german: Schnüffle mehrfach auf Benjamins Grundstück herum.
description.french: Espionne la propriété de Benjamin une fois de trop.
description.spanish: Fisgonea la propiedad de Benjamin demasiadas veces.
description.schinese: 窥探本杰明财产的次数太多。
description.russian: Слишком часто шпионь на территории Бенджамина.
description.brazilian: Bisbilhoteia a propriedade de Benjamin muitas vezes.

description.english: Pay your respects to those no longer with us...
description.german: Erweise denjenigen, die nicht mehr unter uns weilen, deinen Respekt...
description.french: Rends hommage à ceux qui ne sont plus parmi nous...
description.spanish: Presenta tus respetos a los que ya no están entre nosotros...
description.russian: Отдай дань уважения тем, кого с нами больше нет...
description.brazilian: Preste suas homenagens àqueles que não estão mais entre nós....

description.english: Be the worst friend this town could ever ask for!
description.german: Sei die schlechteste Freundin, die sich diese Stadt wünschen könnte!
description.french: Sois la pire amie que cette ville ait jamais eu !
description.spanish: ¡Sé la peor amiga que este pueblo podría pedir!
description.schinese: 做这个镇上最差劲的朋友!
description.russian: Стань худшим другом, которого только мог пожелать этот город!
description.brazilian: Seja a pior amiga que este povoado poderia ter!

displayName.french: Être populaire en vaut la peine

description.english: Be the best friend this town could ever ask for!
description.german: Sei der beste Freund, den sich die Stadt wünschen kann!
description.french: Sois la meilleure amie que cette ville ait jamais eue !
description.spanish: ¡Sé el mejor amigo que este pueblo podría pedir!
description.schinese: 做这个城市最好的朋友!
description.russian: Стань лучшим другом, которого только мог пожелать этот город!
description.brazilian: Seja o melhor amigo que este povoado poderia ter!

displayName.english: Follow Me! I Know a Shortcut!
displayName.german: Mir nach! Ich kenne eine Abkürzung!
displayName.schinese: 跟我来!我知道一条捷径!
displayName.russian: Следуй за мной! Я знаю, как срезать!

description.english: Skip everything you can. (No hard feelings, really!)
description.german: Überspringe alles, was du kannst. (Wir sind dir nicht böse, ehrlich!)
description.french: Passe tout ce que tu peux. (Sans rancune, vraiment !)
description.spanish: Sáltate todo lo que puedas. (¡Sin rencores, de verdad!).
description.schinese: 尽可能跳过一切。(真的,别难过!)
description.russian: Пропускай все, что можно. (Мы не обидимся, честно!)
description.brazilian: Pule o máximo que você puder (sem ressentimentos, de verdade!).

displayName.french: Tout est à nouveau sous contrôle
displayName.spanish: Todo vuelve a estar bajo control

description.english: Let Gen. Hartman shepherd you back into the fold.
description.german: Lass dich von General Hartman zurück in die Herde führen.
description.french: Laisse le général Hartman te ramener au bercail.
description.spanish: Deja que el General Hartman te guíe de vuelta al rebaño.
description.schinese: 让哈特曼将军带你回到正轨。
description.russian: Позволь генералу Хартману вернуть тебя в строй.
description.brazilian: Deixe o General Hartman te guiar de volta ao rebanho.

displayName.german: Beim nächsten Mal hast du bestimmt mehr Glück
displayName.french: Plus de chance la prochaine fois

description.english: Learn the hard way that your actions have consequences.
description.german: Lerne auf die harte Tour, dass deine Handlungen Konsequenzen haben.
description.french: Apprends à la dure que tes actions ont des conséquences.
description.spanish: Aprende por las malas que tus acciones tienen consecuencias.
description.schinese: 用痛苦的方式学习你的行为会产生后果。
description.russian: Убедись на горьком опыте, что у всех действий есть последствия.
description.brazilian: Aprende da maneira mais difícil que suas ações têm consequências.

description.english: Point and Click through everything.
description.german: Klicke dich durch das komplette Spiel.
description.french: Pointe et clique sur tout.
description.spanish: Apunta y Clica en todo.
description.brazilian: Aponte e clique em tudo.
